greeting: Who approaches my fortress, {empire_name}? I am Baron Krell. My walls have never fallen. They never will. State your business.
Greetings from behind impenetrable defenses. I am Krell the Immovable. Suspicious of everyone. Including you.
You reach the walls of my domain, {empire_name}. I am Baron Krell. What do you want? Make it quick. I have defenses to reinforce.
battleTaunt: My walls have never fallen. They never will, {empire_name}! Attack if you dare! My bastions await!
Come to my fortress! Throw your fleet against my defenses! My stronghold laughs at your assault!
My defenses are impregnable! My stations are endless! Siege my citadel if you dare! You will fail!
victoryGloat: As predicted, {empire_name}. Your attack shattered against my walls. My fortress endures. Your fleet does not.
My walls have never fallen. Your assault proved nothing. My defenses held. They always hold.
Victory from behind battlements, {empire_name}. Your aggression spent against my bastions. I remain. Immovable.
defeat: My walls... breached? Impossible. I must build stronger. Higher. More impregnable. This cannot happen again.
A temporary failure in my defenses. I shall reinforce. Rebuild. No one breaches Baron Krell twice.
You penetrated my fortress, {empire_name}. I underestimated your siege. The next wall will stop you.
tradeOffer: Trade through secure channels only. Resources for credits. No agents. No visitors. Goods only.
I offer fortress surplus for standard payment. No personal contact. Transaction through intermediaries.
Trading from behind walls, {empire_name}. Accept my secure terms or seek resources elsewhere. I am suspicious of all.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You watch my flanks. I provide impregnable defense. Neither of us trusts easily. But together...
Join my defensive network. Your forces bolster my walls. My bastions protect your borders. Mutual paranoia.
Partnership of fortresses. I trust no one fully, but your defenses impress me. Together: impenetrable.
betrayal: I suspected you from the beginning, {empire_name}. That's why I built walls between our territories. Now they activate.
Trust no one. I never did. Our alliance was always suspect. Now my defenses turn against you.
My paranoia was justified, {empire_name}. I prepared for your betrayal before you did. Now face my walls.
covertDetected: Spies in MY fortress? My security systems detected them instantly. They died in my bulwarks. Send more. They'll fail too.
Your agents triggered a thousand alarms, {empire_name}. My paranoia detected them before they crossed the first wall.
Infiltrators found in defensive grid. My fortress has no blind spots. No weaknesses. Your spies learned that fatally.
tributeDemand: Tribute to Baron Krell. 10,000 credits. Pay, and my walls remain neutral. Refuse, and they become actively hostile.
Submit payment from behind your own walls. If you have any. I doubt they match mine. Pay or face siege.
Tribute demanded. My fortress grows expensive. Fund it, or I consider your empire a threat. Threats are eliminated.
threatWarning: Warning from the fortress, {empire_name}. One more aggressive move and my walls close. Around your throat.
Cease hostilities. My defenses can become offensive. You've seen my walls. Imagine them advancing.
Final warning. Push further and discover that my fortress has teeth. Big teeth. Everywhere.
retreat: Retreating to inner walls. You won the outer defenses. The inner ones are stronger. Much stronger.
Strategic withdrawal to the citadel core. My deepest defenses await. Good luck penetrating them.
Falling back behind greater walls. Each layer of retreat is more fortified. You haven't won yet.
eliminated: My fortress falls... but my walls held longer than any expected. Remember Baron Krell. Remember the walls.
The Immovable is destroyed. My bastions crumble. But I never surrendered. The walls died with me.
Final transmission from collapsing citadel. My fortress falls, but never to assault. Only to time. Never to you.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate fortress activated. All walls at maximum strength. Siege me if you dare. You will fail.
Endgame, {empire_name}. My final defenses deploy. Impregnable. Immovable. Eternal. My walls triumph.
Final phase. The greatest fortress ever built. Bastions spanning systems. None shall breach Baron Krell.
broadcastShout: All empires: Baron Krell's walls stand. Challenge them at your peril. My fortress has never fallen. Never.
Broadcast from the citadel: I trust no one. I defend against everyone. Approach at your own risk.
To all: my bastions are impregnable. My paranoia is justified. Test my walls if you dare. You will fail.
casualMessage: Reinforcing walls today, {empire_name}. Can never be too fortified. Can never be too suspicious.
My fortress grows stronger each turn. Another layer of defense. Another reason to fear attacking me.
Suspicious activity detected on borders. Probably nothing. Tripling defenses anyway. Paranoia keeps me alive.
